main.name: Marc St√§mpfli
main.bio: I'm a highly dependable and organized individual with years of experience in Web Development. My knowledge in various front-end and back-end technologies, responsive frameworks, databases, and best code practices has allowed me to build and manage various websites for a number of clients both locally and abroad.

education.description: I completed 2 years of my Bachelor's degree until I was given the opportunity to work at Simply Intense Media.

work.title: Web Developer (Full-Time)
work.description: I professionally freelance websites to clients locally an abroad.

work.title: Web Developer (Contract)
work.description: I worked on front-end and back-end development on various modules for a management system. Fully-remote work.

work.title: Sound Engineer (Contract)
work.description: A sound and lighting company specializing in providing equipment for small and large scale events. I transport and setup all the music, lighting and trussing equipment.

work.title: Webmaster (Contract)
work.description: I managed the content for Trinidad Express Newspaper and CCN TV6. Also their ePaper, Social Media and minor video editing for their Beyond the Tape segment. Semi-remote work.

work.title: Web Developer (Full-Time)
work.description: In-house Web Developer for all of MACO Magazines. I managed their websites and social media. Also the digitization of their magazines for flip books. Semi-remote work.

work.title: Web Developer (Full-Time)
work.description: I was a full-time Web Developer. I was also part Web Designer, Server & Database Administrator.

work.title: Sales Clerk (Full-Time)
work.description: Assisting customers in the items for sale as well working the cash register.

testimonials.text: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
